welcome_message_body: Welcome to Willoughby Hills, a charming city known for its scenic parks, rich history, and friendly community. We hope you take the time to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights operated by United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for domestic flights operated by American Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is primarily used for international flights and some domestic flights operated by Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
